mapper.select: select * from `role` where id = #{id} and state > 0 limit 1
select * from `role` where name = #{name} and paasId = #{paasId} and state > 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into `role` (name, remark, type, state, creatorId, createTime, paasId) values (#{name}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{state}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{paasId})
insert into `role_users` (roleId, userId, state, creatorId, createTime, paasId) values (#{roleId}, #{userId}, #{state}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{paasId})
mapper.delete: delete from `role_users` where roleId = #{roleId} and userId = #{userId}
